cinnamon.engine.utils

Interface DefinableBounds

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MutableBounds, MutableSphereBounds

    public interface DefinableBounds

    Declares the minimum mutators for changing a Bounds' size and position.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void centerOn(float x, float y, float z)
      Centers on the given point.
      default void centerOn(Point point)
      Centers on the given point.
      void encompass(float x, float y, float z)
      Resizes to include the given point.
      void encompass(float minX, float minY, float minZ, float maxX, float maxY, float maxZ)
      Moves and resizes to include all points within the rectangle defined by the two given points.
      default void encompass(Point point)
      Resizes to include the given point.
      default void encompass(Point min, Point max)
      Moves and resizes to include all points within the rectangle defined by the two given points.

    • Method Detail

      • centerOn

        void centerOn(float x,
              float y,
              float z)

        Centers on the given point.

        Parameters:
        x - x.
        y - y.
        z - z.

      • centerOn

        default void centerOn(Point point)

        Centers on the given point.

        Parameters:
        point - point.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if point is null.

      • encompass

        void encompass(float x,
               float y,
               float z)

        Resizes to include the given point.

        Unlike encompass(Point, Point), this overload does not make any previously contained point uncontained, i.e. the shape stretches to include the point.

        Parameters:
        x - x.
        y - y.
        z - z.

      • encompass

        void encompass(float minX,
               float minY,
               float minZ,
               float maxX,
               float maxY,
               float maxZ)

        Moves and resizes to include all points within the rectangle defined by the two given points.

        Parameters:
        minX - minimum x.
        minY - minimum y.
        minZ - minimum z.
        maxX - maximum x.
        maxY - maximum y.
        maxZ - maximum z.

      • encompass

        default void encompass(Point point)

        Resizes to include the given point.

        Unlike encompass(Point, Point), this overload does not make any previously contained point uncontained, i.e. the shape stretches to include the point.

        Parameters:
        point - point.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if point is null.

      • encompass

        default void encompass(Point min,
                       Point max)

        Moves and resizes to include all points within the rectangle defined by the two given points.

        Parameters:
        min - minimum point.
        max - maximum point.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if either min or max is null.
